job.name: Translator Speech
job.description: This service offers a streaming API to transcribe conversational speech from one language into text of another language. The API also integrates text-to-speech capabilities to speak the translated text back. Microsoft Translator Speech API enables scenarios like real-time translation of conversations as seen in Skype Translator.
